channel.title: Ahhh, help D:
channel.description:
[b]Well, right now I'm trying to get my NPC Torags to drop Torags armor. The Item ID for a Torag helm is 4745.
[u]My error is this, When when I put the item ID 4745 in my NPCDrops.TMS and my NpcConstants.TMS, it works fine... Gives me no errors at all. However, in game when I kill a torag, it gives me a broken helm.... How can I fix this?[/u][/b]
[b]I'm using Hybrid V3 PVP source and client. It's 317...[/b]

item.title: Ahhh, help D:
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

ItemHandler.dropItem() is where you want to look.

There is an array of barrow ids there.

Read full topic

item.title: Ahhh, help D:
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

Look wherever the dropitem method is…
And find the torag item id

Read full topic

item.title: Ahhh, help D:
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

I’ve seen you post 3 times ~_~
When any barrows armour is dropped, it automatically becomes degraded.

Read full topic
